name: planka
description: Planka is a lightweight self-hosted kanban board for managing tasks and projects. It includes drag-and-drop cards, user assignments, labels, and a clean UI akin to Trello.

features.title: Kanban Boards
features.description: Organize tasks in boards with customizable lists and drag-and-drop card management

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Assign tasks to team members with due dates and priority indicators

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Categorize cards with color-coded labels for visual organization and filtering

features.title: Checklists
features.description: Break down tasks into subtasks with checkbox lists to track completion progress

features.title: File Attachments
features.description: Attach files and images to cards for documentation and reference materials

features.title: Activity Tracking
features.description: View card history and activity logs to monitor changes and updates

features.title: Board Sharing
features.description: Collaborate with team members by sharing boards with configurable access permissions

features.title: Card Comments
features.description: Discuss tasks with threaded comments and @mentions for team communication
